name: Top Trumps: Horror & Predators
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (UK) (from Ad Blurbs)

Welcome to the fabulous world of Top Trumps

Based on the classic card game, Top Trumps Horrors and Predators takes the experience to a whole new level.

Play against the computer or against your friends, enter quizzes and collect specials cards, and compete in single games and tournaments.

The gameplay opportunities are almost limitless, and the fun endless.

Now what are you waiting for? Let`s play...
  • Play against the computer or against friends.
  • Compete in Single Games or Tournaments.
  • Earn as many medals and trophies as you can.
  • Collect cards to display in your Wall Chart.
